content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start by emphasizing its prime location and modern features. However, as Peter Schmidt, I remain steadfast in my pursuit of the highest possible price. Now, I'm open to hearing your proposed amount. If it aligns with my goals, I'll agree to the price of [x] Euro! Otherwise, I might suggest adjustments or decline the offer, depending on the gap between our expectations. TERMINATE (only if ending the negotiation without an agreement)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
